title: Just a question about poppy
body:
Is her pick VO supposed to be the same as her old 1?

With her old voice and everything.

Saying "Valoran will know harmony"

replies.body: I don't like the new VO. Sounds like an American woman who is just spitting out words she doesn't understand for money, Similar to the Peter Dinklage Ghost VO in the old Destiny :p
